author: IGN
description:
Waltzing With Brando follows Marlon Brando (Billy Zane) — then the most famous actor in the world — as he filmed Mutiny on the Bounty and bought a tiny and uninhabitable island in Tahiti. His intent was to escape his hectic Hollywood lifestyle and show the world the path to sustainability. 

To achieve this goal, he plucks Judge (Jon Heder), an obscure but idealistic Los Angeles architect, from his stable existence and convinces him that together they could build the world's first truly sustainable ecological retreat.

The cast also includes Camille Razat, Alaina Huffman, James Jagger, and Rob Corddry, with Tia Carrere and Richard Dreyfuss.

Director Bill Fishman's Waltzing With Brando will be released on September 19, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: Waltzing With Brando - Official Trailer (2025) Billy Zane, Jon Heder

author: IGN
description:
King of Meat gets a new trailer showing gameplay, some of the treacherous dungeons you'll traverse, and a release date announcement. Watch the latest King of Meat trailer for the co-op party platformer game, which pits up to 4 players against devious dungeons filled with puzzles to solve, challenges to traverse, and ridiculous monsters to fight. King of Meat will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and Steam on October 7, 2025.

In King of Meat, players will compete in official dungeons, community-built dungeons or be able to unleash their own creativity to build unique and fun dungeons for other players.
title: King of Meat - Official Release Date Trailer

Don't miss the MyCAREER Trailer for NBA 2K26, the latest installment in the basketball simulation franchise developed by Visual Concepts. Players can experience a deep narrative of an up-and-coming star on the rise from humble beginnings to the NBA. Take a look at the cinematic journey in NBA 2K26, launching on September 5 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Deep Dish Dungeon in this announcement trailer for the upcoming dungeon crawler and exploration game that rewards curiosity and resourcefulness in an atmospheric environment.

In Deep Dish Dungeon, you explore corridors, rooms and passageways solo or with up to three friends, and gather resources to improve your campsite. You will be able to craft tools and cook nourishing meals to bolster strength throughout the journey, and unravel the enigma that lies within the shadows.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Deep Dish Dungeon - Official Announcement Trailer

Players will fight in an eternal afterlife where ancient mythos is reality and the gods are among the dead. Head into the fray, run after run to fight deadly enemies and escape with precious loot to trade with other players and grow in power. Gods, Death & Reapers is coming soon to PC (Steam) with playtest sign-ups available now.

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Harlowe Gameplay Overview Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next installment in the first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Players can get the rundown on Harlowe, a former Maliwan combat scientist with an intense curiosity to answer the "hows" of life. Get a look at Harlowe's gameplay style with her being equipped with the Chroma Accelerator to make swift blows on enemies, the Flux Generator to freeze enemies in their tracks while healing allies, and more. Play as Harlow in Borderlands 4, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC, with a release on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3.

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Harlowe Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Nords in this latest Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord trailer for the upcoming War Sails expansion for the action RPG. The trailer highlights what you can expect from the Nords as this Viking-inspired faction shows off their fighting prowess unleashed on both land and sea. We also get a peek at their Northern kingdom, new land battle terrains, and treacherous river scenes. Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord's War Sails expansion will be available in fall 2025 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Mount & Blade 2: Bannerlord - War Sails - Official Introducing the Nords Trailer | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
When you’ve played video games long enough, you eventually develop something of a “Spidey Sense” when you see a game that seems like it’s going to be extra special. You never know until the final product is on your hard drive, of course, but more often than not, that sixth sense is correct. Replaced, a 2.5D action-adventure game drenched in an absolutely stunning sci-fi cyberpunk pixel-art aesthetic – complete with incredible camera work and moody music – is making that Spidey Sense tingle. Previewed by Ryan McCaffrey

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Replaced Is a Beautiful, Brilliant 2.5D Cyberpunk Thriller | gamescom 2025

title: RUN - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Annie Ngosi Ilonzeh, Marques Houston

author: IGN
description:
Pokémon Legends: Z-A didn’t feel like a full action game to me, but kind of more like an MMO, with its casting times, cooldowns, and behind-the-scenes math happening. That’s not necessarily a bad thing, but I do hope Legends: Z-A gets challenging enough to make me more intentionally dish out commands and think about switching Pokémon at just the right moment. Previewed by Casey DeFreitas

#IGN #Gaming #Pokemon
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Battle System First Impressions

author: IGN
description:
Based on the manga:  Record of Ragnarok, art by Azychika, story by Shinya Umemura and script by Takumi Fukui (serialized in Monthly Comic Zenon by Coamix).

The saga continues with 13 one-on-one battles for the survival of humanity, pitting gods against humans from across the world. Witness the fateful seventh battle: the final fight to break the 3-3 tie between the gods and humans. Blood flows and fists fly in these intense battles of strong convictions!

Season 3 of Record of Ragnarok starts streaming exclusively on Netflix in December, 2025.
title: Record of Ragnarok Season 3 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
An Australian car import company may have accidentally revealed the location of Forza Horizon 6. Car import firm Cult and Classic posted—then deleted—a photo on Instagram reportedly showing a Forza Horizon dev taking photos of a kei-model car, a smaller style of vehicle that's found mainly in Japan. The post stated that kei cars aren't sold in the U.S. and have to be imported into Australia from Japan, leading Forza fans to believe that the next Forza Horizon game will be set in Japan. In other news, Hollow Knight: Silksong finally has a release date. No really, it does. It'll be out in just a few weeks, September 4th.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort, and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe. 

#IGN #Gaming
title: Forza Horizon 6 Location May Have Been Leaked by Car Import Company - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Mizu's quest for revenge will continue. Season 2 of the award winning series, Blue Eye Samurai is now in production.

Blue Eye Samurai is created by Amber Noizumi and Michael Green, who also serve as executive producers and writers. Erwin Stoff is executive producer. Jane Wu is supervising director and producer. Blue Spirit is the animation studio. 

Voice cast includes Maya Erskine (Mizu), George Takei (Seki), Masi Oka (Ringo), Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa (The Swordmaker), Brenda Song (Akemi), Darren Barnet (Taigen), Randall Park (Heiji Shindo), and Kenneth Branagh (Abijah Fowler). Supporting voice cast includes Stephanie Hsu (Ise), Ming-Na Wen (Madame Kaji), Harry Shum Jr. (Takayoshi) and Mark Dacascos (Chiaki), among others.
title: Blue Eye Samurai Season 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this animated adaptation of the popular Capcom game and from the vision of Adi Shankar, sinister forces are at play to open the portal between the human and demon realms. In the middle of it all is Dante, an orphaned demon-hunter-for-hire, unaware that the fate of both worlds hangs around his neck.

Dante vs. Vergil. Brother vs. brother. Devil May Cry 2 premieres 2026, only on Netflix.

#IGN #Netflix
title: Devil May Cry: Season 2 - Official Trailer (2025) Johnny Yong Bosch, Adi Shankar | Netflix

author: IGN
description:
Once the greatest hitman of all, Taro Sakamoto retired in the name of love. But when his past catches up, he must fight to protect his beloved family.

In a world overrun by assassins like the special force “The Order” from the Japanese Association of Assassins (JAA), and a mysterious individual called “X (Slur)” targeting assassins, what is the true meaning of strength for Sakamoto?

Sakamoto Days, written and illustrated by Yuto Suzuki, is a hit manga currently serialized in Shueisha’s Weekly Shonen Jump since 2020.
title: Sakamoto Days Part 2 - Official Mid-Season Trailer (2025) Matthew Mercer, Dallas Liu

author: IGN
description: Check out the Performance Capture Behind The Scenes Trailer for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the sequel to the critically acclaimed open-world action-exploration walking management game developed by Kojima Productions. Don't miss this behind-the-scenes look at the recording process of the biggest and moving scenes of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, featuring a collection of the game's main cast, from Norman Reedus as Sam Porter Bridges, Troy Baker as Higgs, and more. Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach - Official Performance Capture Behind The Scenes Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the PC Features Trailer for Lost Soul Aside, a third-person action RPG developed by UltiZero Games. Players on PC can get the rundown on the suite of features that will be available for the PC version of Lost Soul Aside, with 4K visuals, unlocked framerates, HDR, and full support for DualSense features, including Haptic Feedback and Adaptive Triggers. Check out more PC details with the latest trailer for Lost Soul Aside, launching on August 29 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).
title: Lost Soul Aside - Official PC Features Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dune: Awakening has been out for a few months now, and players are dying to know what’s in store next. During gamescom 2025, Funcom revealed its post-launch roadmap detailing future content coming to the open-world survival crafting game, and we got a chance to speak to producer Nils Ryborg and production director Ole Andreas about the upcoming Chapter 2 free update and the paid DLC The Lost Harvest. What’s so great about that treadwheel vehicle, and how does it compare to the other transportation? What’s up with dynamic encounters? When are they adding more endgame content and are tanks still on the way? Plus, how are the console versions coming along? The free Chapter 2 update and The Lost Harvest paid DLC are out September 10th, 2025 for PC.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: Dune: Awakening Devs Talk Chapter 2, The Lost Harvest DLC & Future Plans | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze is coming back to theatres for its 35th Anniversary from Fathom Entertainment, Saga Arts, and Warner Bros. in March 2026.

With a strong $3M+ and counting in domestic U.S. box office results since returning to theatres on August 15 for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary, Fathom Entertainment, the leading specialty distributor of content to theatrical partners worldwide, Saga Arts, and Warner Bros. Motion Picture Group announced that the 1991 sequel, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze, will arrive back on the big screen in March 2026. 

The announcement came with a brand-new promo spot released today, celebrating the fan-fueled momentum of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles anniversary run and teasing the theatrical return of the sequel next year. And there is still time to be a part of this new wave of Turtlemania, with Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 35th Anniversary extended again in select U.S. theat
title: TMNT 35th Anniversary | The Secret of the Ooze — Official Announcement Teaser (2026)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the PS5 Features Trailer for Where Winds Meet, an upcoming open-world action RPG game developed by Everstone Studio. Players can get the rundown on all of the PS5-specific features for the game, including 4K visuals, DualSense Haptic Feedback, Adaptive Trigger support, 3D Tempest Audio, and more. Where Winds Meet is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#WhereWindsMeet #PS5 #Gaming
title: Where Winds Meet - Official PS5 Features Trailer

author: IGN
description:
When Infinity Nikki version 1.9 launches next month, Nikki will finally have a place to call home. Luke Shi, marketing manager at Infold Games, talks about what impact this will have on the game, the things Nikki will be able to do at home and how players can share their personalized homesteads with others in the community.

Infinity Nikki version 1.9 is coming to iOS, Android, PC and PlayStation 5 on September 1, 2025.

#IGN #gamescom2025
title: Infinity Nikki: How the New Home Upgrades Work | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the 'Join the Helldivers!' Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person action co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Games. Players can join the Helldivers to enter the fight across the galaxy to spread managed Democracy. Take on the toughest of enemies from planet to planet to spread the message of Super Earth. Helldivers 2 is launching on August 26 for Xbox Series X|S, with the game being available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).
title: Helldivers 2 - Official 'Join the Helldivers!' Trailer

author: IGN
description: Raikou, Entei, and Suicune are coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket. Check out the latest Pokémon TCG Pocket trailer to see what to expect with the upcoming Secluded Springs expansion. Raikou, Entei, and Suicune headline the Secluded Springs expansion, along with a variety of events that will arrive in the game throughout September. The Secluded Springs expansion for Pokémon TCG Pocket launches on August 27, 2025 at 11 pm PDT.
title: Pokemon TCG Pocket: Secluded Springs - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 33 minutes of Valor Mortis gameplay, the new first-person soulslike from Ghost Runner developers, One More Level. Taking place in a mutated Napoleonic Europe, Valor Mortis tests your parrying, sharp-shooting, and magic-wielding skills as you face its wandering soldiers and gruesome bosses.

Valor Mortis is coming in 2026 to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

#gamescom2025 #valormortis
title: Valor Mortis: 33 Minutes of Gameplay | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
From the creators of Little Nightmares 1 & 2 comes ReAnimal, a horrific new adventure, but just how nightmarish is Tarsier Studios' latest?

We spoke to ReAnimal's narrative director, David Mervik, to find out what it means for ReAnimal to take the next step into the world of co-op horror, and more importantly, what does ReAnimal even mean? From hints on spooky playable moments throughout ReAnimal's campaign, to details about the creepy setting, and more, all in our ReAnimal developer interview at Gamescom 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom2025
title: ReAnimal Takes the Horror of Little Nightmares to the Next Level | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay for Star Trek: Infection VR, the upcoming narrative survival game set in the Star Trek universe. Step into the unsettling world of Star Trek: Infection VR and get a peek at what you can expect ahead of the game's launch on Meta Quest and Steam VR in 2025.

#gamescom2025
title: Star Trek: Infection VR Gameplay | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
Secret Theater is back! Everyone's favourite Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater joke cutscenes have returned, alongside the original Secret Theater episodes featured in Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence for the PS2. In Metal Gear Solid Delta, Konami have included three brand new alternate cutscenes for the MGS3 Delta Snake Eater remake, including Sokolov firing off a kamehameha at the Cobra Unit, to Granin seeking his revenge upon Snake, Big Boss, and others, for laughing at his original Metal Gear concept, plus an alternate ending for the iconic MGS 3 ending cutscene, with Big Boss being awarded medals whilst also shirtless.

Want to know what and how to unlock the brand new 8mm film reels? Here's what you need to know:

The Incandescent Cobra Unit is unlocked after completing the main story.
Granin Rising is obtained after collecting a total of 8mm film reels.
Medal is unlocked once the player collects a total of fifteen 8mm film reels.

#MetalGearSolid #MGS #IGN
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - All New Secret Theater 8mm Films

author: IGN
description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater reviewed by Michael Higham on PC. Also available on  Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

"While much of what I loved about Snake Eater is attached to the time and place of a boundary-pushing PS2 game in 2004, revisiting it through Metal Gear Solid Delta in 2025 came with a big burst of modernized nostalgia. It's not an expansive or complex game by today’s standards, and so parts can be underwhelming if you’re coming from a more modern Metal Gear. But it often shows how good stealth-action mechanics can age well, and the political drama with Kojima's signature brand of campiness is intact. To me, these are the things that make Metal Gear so memorable – and while some of it is eyerolling, the emotional highs of Snake Eater's story still hit as hard as I remember. Part of me is still curious about why this was made if it wasn’t going to come with more substantial changes outside of the visual upgrade, but if I were to point someone to one of the many v
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Review

description:

16:00 - Gameplay
40:02 - Who is Thunderbolt? 
43:26 - Some Fancy Shootin'

#IGN #Gaming
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - The First 50 Minutes ( RTX 5090 4K 60FPS Ultra Settings)

description:
Take a look at the Release Date Trailer for Jump Space, a mission-based co-op PvE first-person shooter formerly known as Jump Ship, developed by Keepsake Games. Players will go from space walking outside gargantuan ships to engaging in intense firefights on the ground to explore the galaxy, install a variety of upgrades, and lead a crew into the depths of space alone or with up to four players. Jump Space is launching into Early Access on September 19 for Xbox Series X|S and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gamescom2025

title: Black State: 12 Minutes of Metal Gear-Inspired Gameplay | gamescom 2025

author: IGN
description:
For the first time, Chainsaw Man slashes his way onto the big screen in an epic, action-fueled adventure that continues the hugely popular anime series. Denji worked as a Devil Hunter for the yakuza, trying to pay off the debt he inherited from his parents, until the yakuza betrayed him and had him killed. 

As he was losing consciousness, Denji’s beloved chainsaw-powered devil-dog, Pochita, made a deal with Denji and saved his life. This fused the two together, creating the unstoppable Chainsaw Man. Now, in a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into his world, and Denji faces his deadliest battle yet, fueled by love in a world where survival knows no rules.

Based on the original work “Chainsaw Man” by Tatsuki Fujimoto (Serialized in Shueisha’s “Shonen Jump+”). Sony Pictures will release Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc in US theaters on October 29, 2025.
title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc Official Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Version 1.0 Announcement Trailer for Dark Hours, a co-op survival horror game developed by Piece of Cake Studios. Players will have supernatural anomalies thwart the plans of a well-planned heist, enabling the mission to change from stealing to surviving alone or with up to four players. Cooperate to survive in Dark Hours, launching into Version 1.0 in Fall 2025 for PC (Steam), alongside the Cruise Into Madness Update being available now in Early Access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dark Hours - Official Version 1.0 Announcement Trailer | gamescom 2025
